title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) which are showing up prominently in the Open Type dialog.
OB: The obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) are being displayed prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) should not be displayed in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the IDE.
2. Open the Open Type dialog.
3. Observe the presence of obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) in the list of available types.
